articles.title: Disappointment for SA's Oosthuizen as Collin Morikawa wins Open Championship - News24
articles.description: Collin Morikawa won the Open Championship at Royal St. George's as the American became the first player to win two different majors on debut.
articles.content:
Debutant Collin Morikawa held off a charge from Jordan Spieth to win the 149th Open Championship by two shots after a scintillating Sunday's action at Royal St. George's.

articles.title: Collin Morikawa holds off Jordan Spieth to win the Open Championship - The Mirror
articles.description: The American came into the final round one shot off the lead and managed to hold off his compatriot Jordan Spieth to clinch his second major championship victory
articles.content:
Collin Morikawa has won the 149th Open Championship after holding off Jordan Spieth to win by two shots.
